text: William James Dennis (born November 1, 1966), known as Willie D, is an American rapper. He is best known as being a member of the rap group, Geto Boys. Willie D took up boxing at the age of 11 and in 1985, became the Golden Gloves Champion for the State of Texas. Instead of becoming a professional boxer, he became a well known MC. J Prince, the founder of Rap-A-Lot Records saw his talent and added him to the his label as well as the group which would become known as The Geto Boys. == Discography == === Albums === Willie D has released 6 studio albums: Year Album 1989 Controversy 1992 I'm Goin' Out Lika Soldier 1994 Play Witcha Mama 2000 Universal Small Souljah 2001 Gutta Mixx 2003 My Testimony of Redemption ==Websites== * Official website Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:Rappers from Texas Category:Singers from Houston
title: Willie D
